extendedInfo.description: ESC Mobile connects your mobile field workforce to your ESC service management software to improve productivity, service and profits. Give field techs access to essential job information, managers the ability to assign jobs and schedule technicians remotely, and office personnel real-time updates to and from the field. FREE DOWNLOAD â TRY TODAY!With ESC Mobile, field service technicians can:â¢	View service dispatches & work order information â¢	Easily track service tech time â¢	Use GPS tracking, mapping and routing, & turn-by-turn driving directionsâ¢	Create, view, email, and print service quotes & invoices â¢	Add pictures from device camera to customer recordâ¢	Accept/reject items on quotes & invoicesâ¢	View customer account, service history, equipment & service maintenance agreement information â¢	Add/edit customer equipment â¢	Scan bar codes for part or serial number searchingâ¢	Process payments & prepayments, including PCI compliant credit card processing â¢	Capture customer authorization & acceptance signatures â¢	Receive scheduling notifications for new dispatchesâ¢	And much more!ESC Mobile, by dESCO, is a simple and affordable way to connect more people, in more places, on more devices. Leading field service software for small to medium sized service industry businesses including HVAC, Plumbing, Electrician, Equipment, Generator & Pump, Garage & Overhead Door, Appliance Repair, Pest Control, Construction, Locksmith, Security, and other Mechanical Contractors. Thereâs a better way to manage field service â it all starts with ESC Mobile! To learn more or request a free demo, visit www.desco-soft.com

reviews.title: Seems to be a lot more stable.
reviews.comment: Stability has improved over v.12 greatly. Being able to perform quotes in the field is so much easier now!!! Still needs to be able to store info locally, especially price books. And be able to upload pictures from gallery versus having to use the app camera access. Once again we don\'t always have a signal. Sooo slow at times for things to pull up that I just looked at.
reviews.author: Eli Gaffke

reviews.title: Credit card reader never works
reviews.comment: We have been waiting six weeks for the credit card swiper to work.  despite several updates it still doesn\'t work.  id go back to version 12.
reviews.author: Butch Dillon

reviews.title: I\'m a huge fan of this.
reviews.comment: This system has accomplished what I\'ve wanted for years.  Scheduling, quotes, invoicing, marketing, etc.  It helps with all and is completely programmable for your needs.  For the haters out there... stop whining and live by the system.
reviews.author: Matthew Melton

reviews.title: Credit card won\'t swipe
reviews.comment: The credit card reader won\'t work after the update
reviews.author: Christopher Channel

reviews.title: Needs improvement
reviews.comment: Needs to be faster and show more content
reviews.author: Chris Name

reviews.title: Can\'t run credit cards
reviews.comment: Called multiple times over 2 weeks and neither galaxy sIII AND I phones won\'t allow the reader to connect. I feel that I have to convince the tech support this is happening when it worked fine with version 12.  Costing us money in fees and frustration dealing with a team I have to convince there\'s an issue.
reviews.author: Matt Woods

reviews.comment: Great app...love having the information at iur fingertips on the road, plus seeing and creating quotes now. Could still use better speed though.
reviews.author: Mark Kenniston
